DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to analyze the effects of epidural anesthesia and analgesia on intraoperative clinical outcome, postoperative recovery, metabolic changes, and immune functions of the patients receiving open liver resection.
DOC.brief_title: Effect of Epidural Anesthesia and Analgesia on Patients' Outcomes After Liver Resection
DOC.criteria: left hemihepatectomy left lateral sectionectomy clinical diagnosis of hepatolithiasis abnormal coagulation tests diabetes mellitus significant cirrhosis
